---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Office Notes, Office Memoranda of Coram, 
 Court's or Judge's orders
appearances, Court's orders of directions
and Registrar's orders
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Mr. Shriniwas Deshpande, Advocate for the Official Liquidator with Mr. Deepak
Persoya, Official Liquidator
CORAM :
ANIL L. PANSARE, J.
DATE :
-02-2025
The Official Liquidator submits that in terms of order
dated 31-1-2025 passed by this Court, he shall file annual
statements in all the pending cases. He makes a request to not
take action on the lapses committed while furnishing annual
statements as the mistake was not intentional. He submits that
he has recently joined. He assures to take corrective measures. 
On the basis of assurance so given, annual statements
submitted by the Official Liquidator stand filed with a direction
(4) cmp 5.1995+
to file fresh annual statements in accordance with the provisions
of Companies Act, 1956 read with order dated 31-1-2025
passed by this Court.
No further order is required. 

(Anil L. Pansare, J.)
wasnik
Signed by: Mr. A. Y. Wasnik
Designation: PA To Honourable Judge
